010package imagingbook.common.threshold.global;
011
012/**
013 * Simple global thresholder which sets the threshold centered between
014 * the image's minimum and maximum pixel value.
015 * 
016 * @author WB
017 * @version 2022/08/01
018 *
019 */
020public class MinMaxThresholder implements GlobalThresholder {
021        
022        public MinMaxThresholder() {
023                super();
024        }
025
026        @Override
027        public int getThreshold(int[] h) {
028                // calculate mean of entire image:
029                int K = h.length;
030                int minVal, maxVal;
031                
032                // find the min. pixel value
033                for (minVal = 0; minVal < K; minVal++) {
034                        if (h[minVal] > 0) {
035                                break;
036                        }
037                }
038                
039                // find the max. pixel value
040                for (maxVal = K - 1; maxVal >= 0; maxVal--) {
041                        if (h[maxVal] > 0) {
042                                break;
043                        }
044                }
045                
046                int q = (minVal < maxVal) ? 
047                                (int) Math.rint(0.5 * (minVal + maxVal)) : -1;
048                return q;
049        }
050}
